thread.title: A discombobulating ride with an aerobatics pilot
thread.title_full: A discombobulating ride with an aerobatics pilot

title: A discombobulating ride with an aerobatics pilot
text: > Top News A discombobulating ride with an aerobatics pilot Associated Press sports writer John Marshall, left, gets some last-minute instructions from a member of the flight crew, before getting an aerobatic ride from Red Bull plane racing pilot Kirby Chambliss, second from right, at the pilot's home Wednesday, April 29, 2015, in Eloy, Ariz. Practicing three times a day, seven days a week, Chambliss turned himself into a five-time U.S. national aerobatics champion and was one of the founding pilots in the Red Bull Air Races when the series began in 2003. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin)
